summary: Adds all Lantern Armors, Weapons and Spells to Skyrim with MCM and Rings who greet the Wearer.
descriptionHtml:
[b][color=red]Rings still have vanilla Textures if you want you can create custom ones and send them to me (PM me)[/color][/b]

[b][color=red]Dawnguard and SkyUI required[/color][/b]

Mod discription
Welcome to the all new Lantern Project Z now with Mod Configuration menu choose witch of the 9 Lantern Corps you want to join. This adds the respective Ring and if the Ring is equipt you get the Power and Armor and get accepted into the corps.

KNOWN ISSUES
-Bound Will/Fear crossbow Spells can be added via consol but are buggy and I have no Idea how to get them to work. Sometimes they get stuck on the back of the character.
-the chest before hig hrothgar for klimmicks supplies semms to disappear.

Future Plans
- add new textures for the rings (if anybody wants to do this message me)
- create CBBE/UNP/UNPB

Videos
on old Version without Z^^
Skyrim Mod Spotlight - The Green Lantern Project:
[youtube]cMrdu62E7V0[/youtube]

Credits
this mod was made by Pyrodark and
Zigadirasu and TheEvilKIng
author: Pyrodark and Zigadirasu and TheEvilKIng
